Privacy Policy

Last Updated: January 6, 2026

Welcome to Campus Market. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our student marketplace platform.

Important Notice: This is a demonstration application. All user data is stored locally in your browser using localStorage. No information is transmitted to external servers.

1. Information We Collect

1.1 Personal Information

When you register for an account, we collect:

  • Full name
  • Email address
  • Password (stored locally, not encrypted in this demo)
  • User role (buyer or seller)

1.2 Marketplace Activity

We track your marketplace interactions including:

  • Items you list for sale
  • Purchases you make
  • Resources you download
  • Items you save or bookmark
  • Search queries and browsing history

2. How We Use Your Information

We use the collected information to:

  • Provide and maintain the marketplace platform
  • Personalize your experience based on your role (buyer/seller)
  • Display your activity in your dashboard
  • Track marketplace statistics and analytics
  • Improve our services and user experience

3. Data Storage

LocalStorage Implementation: All your data is stored locally in your browser's localStorage. This means:
  • Data persists only on your current device and browser
  • Clearing browser data will permanently delete all information
  • No data is synchronized across devices
  • No data is sent to external servers

4. Data Security

While we strive to protect your information, please note:

  • This is a demonstration application without production-level security
  • Passwords are stored in plain text in localStorage (not recommended for production)
  • Anyone with access to your device can potentially access your data
  • For production use, proper encryption and backend authentication would be required

5. Information Sharing

Since this is a frontend-only application:

  • No information is shared with third parties
  • No data is transmitted over the internet
  • All data remains on your local device

6. Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access all your stored data through the dashboard
  • Delete your account and all associated data
  • Export your data (manually through browser developer tools)
  • Clear all data by clearing your browser's localStorage

7. Cookies and Tracking

This application uses:

  • LocalStorage for data persistence
  • SessionStorage for temporary session management
  • No third-party cookies or tracking scripts
  • No analytics or advertising trackers

8. Children's Privacy

This platform is intended for college and university students (typically 18+ years old). We do not knowingly collect information from individuals under 18 years of age.

9. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The "Last Updated" date at the top of this page indicates when the policy was last revised. Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

10. Production Considerations

If this application were to be deployed in production, the following would be implemented:

  • Backend server with secure database storage
  • Encrypted password storage using industry-standard hashing (bcrypt, Argon2)
  • HTTPS encryption for all data transmission
  • Proper authentication and authorization systems
  • GDPR and CCPA compliance measures
  • Regular security audits and penetration testing
  • Data backup and recovery procedures

11. Contact Information

For questions about this Privacy Policy or your data, please contact:

  • Email: support@campusmarket.com
  • Help Center: Available through the footer links
Disclaimer: This is a demonstration project for educational purposes. In a real-world application, proper security measures, backend infrastructure, and legal compliance would be essential.
